name: Wurlim Frostking
aura: Increase Ally  in Doom Tower battles by 40

skills.desc:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 30% chance of placing a [Freeze] debuff for 1 turn.

Places a [Perfect Veil] buff on the ally with the lowest HP for 2 turns if the [Freeze] debuff is placed. Places a [Veil] buff on the ally with the lowest HP for 1 turn if the [Freeze] debuff is blocked or resisted.
skills.name: Winds of Winter
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.desc:
Attacks all enemies. Has a 70% chance of placing a 25% [Decrease C. DMG] debuff and a 50% [Decrease ACC] debuff for 2 turns. These debuffs cannot be resisted.

Also places a 30% [Increase C. DMG] buff on all allies for 2 turns.
